Easy unit converter for various unit conversions.
This software is developed by TECHNOLOGIES company. dProgs software department

string-array.name: Description_Category_Angle
string-array.item: The basic unit of measure of flat corners in the modern mathematics
The unit of measure of a flat corner equal of 1/90 parts of a right angle
The unit of measure of flat corners equal of 1/60 degrees
The unit of measure of a corner equal of 1/3600 parts of degree or 1/60 minutes
Unit of measure of corners. One turn is equal to the minimum angle of rotation at which position (asymmetrical) system coincides with the initial
The unit of measure of flat corners equal to a hundredth part of a right angle
The unit of measure of corners accepted in artillery and equaling one six-thousandth part of a turn

string-array.name: Description_Category_Data
string-array.item: Bit — a base unit of measure of quantity of the information (one bit in binary notation) accepting values 0 or 1
Nibble — is a four-bit aggregation or half an octet or corresponds to a single hexadecimal digit
Byte — unit of storage and processing of the digital information. In modern computing systems the byte is considered equal to eight bits
Word - unit of storage of the information to equal 2 bytes
Double word - unit of storage of the information to equal 4 bytes
Quadruple word - unit of storage of the information to equal 8 bytes
Kilobit — a unit of measure of quantity of the binary information
Megabit — quantity of the information, equal 1000000 (million) bits
Gigabit — quantity of the information, equal 100000000 (billion) bits (1000 MB)
Terabit — the quantity of the information equal of 1000 GBs
Kilobyte — a unit of measure of quantity of the information, to equal 1024 bytes
Megabyte — a unit of measure of quantity of the information, to equal 1 048 576 bytes (1024 KB)
Gigabyte — a multiple unit of measure of quantity of the information, equal 1 073 741 824 byte (1024 MB)
Terabyte — a unit of measure of quantity of the information, to equal 1 099 511 627 776 standard (8-bit) bytes (1024 GB)
Petabyte — a unit of measure of quantity of the information, to equal 1024 TB
Exabyte — a unit of measure of quantity of the information, to equal 1024 PT

Stand-alone unit of measure of energy and the work, equal 4 612 000 J
The energy and work unit of measure equal of 1055,06 J
Stand-alone unit of measure of energy and the work, equal 9,81 J
The energy and work unit of measure equal of 1,36 J

string-array.name: Description_Category_Freq
string-array.item: The unit of measure of frequency equal of 10^-6 hertz
The unit of measure of frequency equal of 10^-3 hertz
The SI unit of frequency defined as the number of cycles per second of a periodic phenomenon. 1 Hz means one execution of such process for one second: 1 Hz = 1/sec
The unit of measure of frequency equal to one thousand of hertz
The unit of measure of frequency equal to one million of hertz
The unit of measure of frequency equal to billion of hertz
The unit of measure of frequency equal to trillion of hertz

The unit of measure of volume equal to volume of a cube with length of edges in 1 foot
The unit of measure of volume equal to 1 ton of liquefied natural gas
The metric unit of measure of volume equal of 0,001 cubic meter
The unit of measure of volume equal approximately of 3,78 liters
The unit of measure of volume equal approximately of 4,55 liters

string-array.name: Description_Category_Length
string-array.item: The unit of measure of length equal one thousandth meter
The unit of measure of length equal of the one 100-th meter
The unit of measure of length equal of the one tenth meter
The unit of measure of length defined as distance, passed by light in vacuum for 1/299 792 458 seconds
The unit of measure of length equal to one thousand of meters
Nonmetric unit of measure of length
The Nonmetric unit of length equal of 1/12 foots
The unit of measure of length applied to measurement of traveling distances
The Nonmetric unit of measure of length equal to three foots
A nautical unit of measure equal to one tenth of a nautical mile or 100 fathoms, or sometimes 120 fathoms

string-array.name: Description_Category_Mass
string-array.item: The unit of measure of weight equal one millionth kg
The unit of measure of weight equal one thousandth kg
The unit of measure of weight equal to weight of the standard of kg of the International bureau of measures and scales
The unit of measure of weight equal to one thousand of kgs
The unit of measure of weight applied in military science in the USA and Great Britain
The unit of measure of weight equal of 1/16 pounds
The unit of measure of weight extended in the English-speaking countries
The British unit of measure of weight equal to 14 pounds or 6,35029318 kgs
Out-of-date Russian unit of measure of weight
Unit of measure of weight of jewels

string-array.name: Description_Category_Temp
string-array.item: The Unit of measure of temperature applied in SI. As the scale beginning the temperature of freezing of water
The Unit of measure of temperature seldom used in a life. On one of versions, for 100 degrees was body temperature of the wife of the inventor of a scale — Gabriel Farengejta
The Unit of measure of temperature applied in SI. As the scale beginning the absolute zero
Seldom used unit of measure of temperature. As the scale beginning the absolute zero
Used in Russia to a XVIII-th century a temperature unit of measure is used. As zero the temperature of boiling of water
It is possible, the oldest unit of measure of temperature. As the scale beginning the temperature of thawing of snow was used. Nowadays it is not used
Nowadays not used unit of measure of temperature. For one degree it is considered to be temperature at which a mix water-spirit extends on 1/1000
Nowadays not used unit of measure of temperature. As the scale beginning the temperature of freezing of the sated hydrochloric solution
